body: Yah surprisingly despite English being my first language it's pretty hard to find a way to make certain Japanese things flow smoothly in English, the part about considering it training was a bit of a headscratcher and this was more of a test to see if I could do it in the first place and I imagine I'll only get better the more I do it :)
Ay I’m also a new translator :> But because I’m still new, I can’t really give any advice besides reading the lines “out loud,” since certain parts feel a bit clunky.

I was actually the one to translate this! It's my first translation so any advice would be greatly appreciated! I'm also looking to do more translation so please take a look at the last page or message me on discord at Oni Fucker#7002
